name: Hidden Treasures in the Forest of Dreams
name_original: Hidden Treasures in the Forest of Dreams
description:
Take a break from action-packed franchises and brain teasers.

Slowly explore a procedural world of beauty and scan mysterious Treasures and Creatures.
Gentle adversity and frequent milestones keep you engaged while you get lost in a pathless paradise.

- Safe and soothing experience for all ages.
- Graphics straight out of a dream.
- 300+ Treasures to collect.
- 500+ decor items fuel a fine-tuned procedural engine.
- Billions of Dreams to explore.
- Original music score composed by Jordan Guerette.

Unlock your innate explorer instincts and let the beauty of your surroundings guide you through a most relaxing digital experience.

Welcome to the Forest of Dreams
